description.para: The statsd module provides a simple way to push data into reconnoiter from other applications. See https://github.com/etsy/statsd for more details.

moduleconfig.parameter: The port on which to listen for statsd packets.
The number of packets to recv() during each eventer cycle.
A specific check to which all statsd data will be delegated.

example.title: A sample statsd configuration.
example.programlisting: <noit> <modules> <module image="statsd" name="statsd"/> </modules> <checks> <check uuid="1b4e28ba-2fa1-11d2-893f-e9b761bde3fb" module="statsd" target="127.0.0.1" period="60000" timeout="30000"> <config><port>8125</port></config> </check> </checks> </noit>
